short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily synchronize courses you want from UCSB GOLD with Google Calendar and finds schedule conflicts. May the course be with you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gauchocal is an extension to UCSBâ€™s GOLD course catalog allowing for quick and easy synchronization of your schedule with Google Calendar. It provides easy tools for copying your schedule onto google calendar as well as viewing the courses that conflict with what you are already planning to take:

* Green = Already/Successfully added to your google calendar!
* Red = Conflicts with course(s) on your schedule/calendar :(
 
Finally, gauchocal can help with the sprint to add all of your courses as soon as pass times open by keeping track of the add codes for all of the courses that you have added to your calendar:

* Add codes can be found by simply clicking the extension button in the menu and then hovering over the course.
